text: The Society of Biblical Literature (SBL) is a learned society founded in 1880 with the name Society of Biblical Literature and Exegesis. The SBL is dedicated to the academic study of the Bible and related ancient literature. There are 8,300 individuals from over 100 countries and the membership is open to the public. Since 1929 the SBL has been a constituent society of the American Council of Learned Societies.SBL @ American Council of Learned Societies official site. == References == === Sources === * == Other websites == * * Category:Research organizations Category:Religious organizations Category:1880 establishments Category:Bible
title: Society of Biblical Literature
